definitions.body: : Pr 28:15 lion (As. aria, Eth. 0arwe: wild beast, cf. also [[אַרְיֵה]] infr.)—[[אֲרִי]] Am 3:12 +13 t.+ 2Sa 23:20 Qr (Kt [[אריה]]), La 3:10 (id.) + Ps 22:17 ([[כָּֽאֲרִי]] for wh .rd [[כאדו]] = [[כָּרוּ]] cf. De Pe Che crit. note); pl. [[אֲרָיִים]]1 K 1Ki 10:20; [[אֲרָיוֹת]] (also m.) Zep 3:3 + 16 t. (f. Je 51:38 ? but cf. Ju Jdg 14:5);—lion, lit. in narrative Ju Jdg 14:5, 1Sa 17:34, 1Sa 17:36, 1Sa 17:37, 2Sa 23:20 = 1Ch 11:22, 2Ki 17:25, 2Ki 17:26, Pr 22:13, Pr 26:13, Ct So 4:8 cf. Am 3:12, Am 5:19; lion-images 1Ki 7:29, 1Ki 7:29, 1Ki 7:36, 1Ki 10:19, 1Ki 10:20 = 2Ch 9:18, 2Ch 9:19, in comparison Nu 23:24, Nu 24:9, Ju Jdg 14:18, Is 38:13, Je 51:38, 2Sa 1:23, Ez Eze 22:5, La 3:10; metaph. Na 2:12, Zep 3:3, Je 50:17, Ez Eze 19:2, Eze 19:6, Pr 28:15. For [[כארי]] Ps 22:17 rd. [[כארו]], cf above. Cf. also [[אַרְיֵה]].
